title: Any word on if the ranked curfew in the early hours of the morning will be removed?
body:
Server now has around 140-145k ranked accounts and just wondering if that is finally enough to remove the curfew that was introduced when there were only 40k ranked players. 

Source: http://oce.op.gg/statistics/tier/ As of this post there are 139k players who are ranked on the server and this doesn't include people who may still be completing their provisional's.

replies.body: It should be removed i agree, it goes down for three hours right? I don't see the point, what difference is three hours going to do especially when its quick to find games just before the curfew happens, tried it many times and i find games in just a few minutes at like 3:30am, the curfew is pointless and a little annoying.
